description: Welcome home to this beautiful pool home located in the heart of Chatsworth. This home has a lot to offer on top of being one of the larger single story homes in the neighborhood. As you enter into the home, you will be welcomed to an oversized living room and dining room that has a free standing custom see through rock fireplace, stunning wood beams, custom beveled stained glass windows and a large sliding door to allow all the wonderful natural light in. The large kitchen provides an ample amount of space for any chef in the family to make those wonderful meals. The front bedroom is great for an office or third bedroom with custom beveled windows and a full bathroom down the hallway. This property also has two primary suites. The first primary suite has custom stained glass windows in both the bedroom and bathroom. The bathroom features a large vanity top, large mirror and a jetted tub/shower combo. The main primary suite is designed to have a peaceful retreat feel. The primary retreat has a large stone feature wall, wood beams, see through gas fireplace that you can enjoy in bed or relaxing in the soaker tub. The oversized bathroom has wood beams, large jetted soaker tub with remote control settings for different color lights, music and more, a large steam room/sauna dual shower. The black bottom pool was designed for natural heating along with a shed for workshop area. This property has a dual AC/Heat system and roof was partial replaced in 2019.

For those with a green thumb, the backyard features a variety of fruit trees, including a fig tree, lemon tree, and lilac tree, allowing you to indulge in the fresh flavors of your own garden.  8200 Sale Ave is more than just a house; it's a haven of elegance and tranquility. Don't miss the opportunity to make this exquisite property your home. Contact us today to schedule a private tour and experience the beauty and serenity for yourself.

First time on the market in over 50 years! A spacious, stylish, 1-story authentic Mid-Century Modern, Walnut Acres-adjacent property in a quiet residential section of Woodland Hills. Cue up some Miles or Brubeck on the Hi-Fi, mix a drink, settle back in your lounge chair and enjoy a cozy evening by the two-sided stone fireplace. Bring your imagination and your interior designer to this exceptional property and make it all your own.Built in 1964, this 5 bedroom, 3 bathroom home has been lovingly maintained and boasts a spacious 2,824 square foot floor plan on a flat, over-sized 16,438 square foot lot so you'll have plenty of space for entertaining by the sparkling 40 foot pool. The living room with stone fireplace is a comfortable space to relax and gaze out the sliding glass doors to the massive backyard. The wood paneled family room offers a warm gathering space with a stone hearth and built-in cocktail bar. The adjacent dining area is perfect for hosting dinner parties (fondue anyone?). The eat-in kitchen is nicely sized, includes an electric glass cooktop, built-in electric double-oven with convection, and lots of natural light. The primary bedroom has an en suite bathroom and features a walk-in closet and sliding glass doors opening up to the patio and pool area. Three other bedrooms are on one side of the house with one bedroom and en suite bathroom located on the opposite side of the house. Outside, the property offers the aforementioned pool along with a landscaped backyard, an above ground spa, Trex deck, concrete patio, cozy fire pit plus a fenced garden area. The convenient laundry room is located right off of the kitchen and there's a large 3-car garage with workshop area and lots of shelving. The garage and circular driveway provide ample parking for multiple vehicles. The Mid-Century Modern style offers a perfect blend of form and function offering a minimalist and modern aesthetic that's both timeless and practical. This quiet neighborhood is just 1 mile from world-class shopping and dining at The Village at Topanga. Here's your wonderful opportunity to own a unique Mid-Century Modern home where your creativity and updates will truly make it shine. Whether you're a fan of classic MCM design or you're looking for a home that embodies simplicity and elegance, this property delivers.

Fantastic, 4 bed, 4 bath, 3,683 sqft ranch-style, mid-century modern jewel situated on a quiet residential neighborhood, south of the Boulevard in the hills of Encino. Striking architectural details display classic roof line, paneled siding, and stone faÃ§ade and makes for great curb appeal! Original mid-century touches inside, such as wood floors, exposed beam ceilings, and so much more carry the aesthetic inside. Private, gated front courtyard leads to formal entry opening to versatile living area.  Formal dining room features large, curved solid glass window and mirrored walls to bring the natural light inside. Living area is dominated by a substantial, double-sided fireplace faced with natural stone which splits two living spaces, which feature pitched, high, ceilings with exposed beams, a full wet bar, and double French doors out to back patio. Generous, light-filled updated kitchen offers recessed lighting, tile floor, granite counters, a butcher block island, abundant cabinets for storage built, and cozy breakfast bar. Utility area off kitchen features laundry hookups, storage, and access to back yard. A private bedroom, offering ceiling fan and mirrored closet with access to full bath would be an ideal private guest suite. Down the hall at the other side of the house are the rest of the bedrooms, including one that has been converted to a library with wood paneling, built-in shelving, and a rolling ladder. Other bedroom features a ceiling fan, mirrored closet, sizable window, and direct access to an updated Â¾ Jack & Jill bath with double sink vanity. Impressive master suite boasts private French doors out to backyard, enormous walk-in closet, luxurious Â¾ en-suite with step-free shower and double-sink vanity, and direct access to additional room ideal for use as private gym or nursery. Over 18,000 sqft lot results in sprawling yard with covered patio, and several additional seating areas, covered and uncovered, built-in bbq area, pool, private putting green, decorative pond and fountain, and mature trees and landscaping, resulting in a private oasis and retreat, perfect for recreation or entertaining.  Attached 2-car garage has direct access to the house and additional parking in the wide driveway, including possible RV or Boat parking. Shopping and dining on Ventura Blvd just minutes north. Location, in easy proximity to both the city and the valley, near the Lake Encino preserve, hiking trails, Braemar Country Club, and the Skirball cannot be beat.

Welcome to this charming, Boho chic ranch-style home in the desirable West Westchester neighborhood. This character-filled home offers a seamless blend of indoor and outdoor living and features a thoughtfully designed layout and a wealth of delightful features. Approach the home via a Spanish paver walkway that leads to a covered lounge area, offering a perfect spot to relax and take in the surroundings. The front yard is beautifully framed by a white picket fence and boasts eco-friendly turf grass. Step inside to discover refinished original oak hardwood flooring that guides you from the entry hall into the formal living room, complete with a wood-burning fireplace, and into the inviting family room, adorned with plantation shuttered windows and a sliding glass door that opens to the backyard. The galley kitchen is a true highlight, featuring updated fixtures, stainless steel appliances, and pendant lighting. It seamlessly connects to a sun-drenched dining area with built-in glass display cabinets and a peninsula counter that creates a bridge of function and style toward the open living space. The generous primary bedroom impresses with built-in shelving and ample closet space. Its ensuite windowed bathroom boasts a step-in shower, updated fixtures, and an extra-wide vanity with a built-in hamper. Situated on the side of the home, the two guest bedrooms offer shuttered windows, custom closet built-ins, and updated fixtures and are separated by a remodeled bathroom with a double vanity in the hallway.The front to back flow of SoCal indoor-outdoor living is topped off by an idyllic backyard that offers a built-in BBQ kitchen with bar seating and retractable awning, turf grass, and paver patio area all to maximize your outdoor enjoyment. Additional upgrades to the home include central HVAC and triple-paned windows. This prime location offers convenience, with proximity to the beach, local restaurants, shops, and easy access throughout the Westside and South Bay. Experience the allure of this bohemian oasis and embrace the West Westchester lifestyle.
